title: New: Kuhn – Stoneskipper (S.Maharba Remix)
body:
Having remixed **WU LYF** earlier on in the year, **s.**

**maharba** has graced us with yet another fantastic attempt, this time at cutting up **Kuhn’s** _Stoneskipper_. Seemingly heavy on the **Flying Lotus** influence, it morphs the original almost beyond recognition, introducing a drum and bass inspired element to the track. As the comments on Soundcloud indicate, this remix goes hard and almost feels like it should be soundtracking a sci-fi horror flick. Mindfuck all round.

 [Kuhn – Stoneskipper (S.Maharba Remix)](http://soundcloud.com/s-maharba/kuhn-stoneskipper-s-maharba) by [S.Maharba](http://soundcloud.com/s-maharba)
